m_vList.NAME: Explore Olbius
m_vList.KANA: オルビュースノタンサク
m_vList.DESC: Go explore Olbius.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: Encounter
m_vList.KANA: デアイ
m_vList.DESC: Invite Sorel to go out.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 2
m_vList.KANA: デアイ2
m_vList.DESC: Hazel commissions you to meet the janitor Oregano.
m_vList.CONDITION: Walk from the “Entrance of the Academy“ towards south and cross the bridge, then you can find “Oregano’s Cabin“. Go to “Oregano’s Cabin“.

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 3
m_vList.KANA: デアイ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster appearing near “Oregano’s home“./【Location】 South of the “Entrance of the Academy“, across the bridge.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Wolf Prowling in Front of the Cabin“ appearing near “Oregano’s Cabin“.

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 4
m_vList.KANA: デアイ4
m_vList.DESC: Enter the “Lost Woods“ to gather herbal medicine.
m_vList.CONDITION: Set off for the “Lost Woods“.

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 5
m_vList.KANA: デアイ5
m_vList.DESC: After parting from Cresson, set off for the depths of the “Lost Woods“ to gather herbal medicine./【Location】 Just follow Peppermint’s guidance.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go deep into the “Lost Woods“ and go to the “White Lotus Pool“./Enter the depths of the woods following the fairy’s guidance.

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 6
m_vList.KANA: デアイ6
m_vList.DESC: A swarm of monsters showed up in the “White Lotus Pool“! Go repel them./【Location】 The depths of the “Lost Woods“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Wolf Boss of a Small Wolf Pack“ appearing in the “White Lotus Pool“.

m_vList.NAME: Encounter 7
m_vList.KANA: デアイ7
m_vList.DESC: Send the girl found in the depths of the “Lost Woods“ back to the “Academy“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Majorum in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Awaken the Girl
m_vList.KANA: メザメヌショウジョ
m_vList.DESC: Go with Majorum Sensei to check on the girl’s status.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Majorum in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Awaken the Girl 2
m_vList.KANA: メザメヌショウジョ2
m_vList.DESC: Go find the monster in the “White Lotus Pool“ and gain the ingredient for the “Eye-Opening Medicine of Awakening“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Enter the depths of the “Lost Woods“ and go to the “White Lotus Pool“.

m_vList.NAME: Awaken the Girl 3
m_vList.KANA: メザメヌショウジョ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster in the “White Lotus Pool“ and gain the ingredient for the “Eye-Opening Medicine of Awakening“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Goblin Strayed from the Herd“ appearing in the “White Lotus Pool“.

m_vList.NAME: Awaken the Girl 4
m_vList.KANA: メザメヌショウジョ4
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the “Eye-Opening Medicine of Awakening“ and give it to Majorum Sensei in the Academy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the “Eye-Opening Medicine of Awakening“ to Majorum./The ingredients are “Mysterious Milk“, “Water Lily“ and “Morning Dew Drop“./“Mysterious Milk“ can be gained from “Goblins“.

m_vList.NAME: The Omen of the Dream
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ
m_vList.DESC: Invite Wistyria to have meals with you.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Wistyria in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Omen of the Dream 2
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ2
m_vList.DESC: Go to “Ruhuna“ to confirm the details of the Goblins elimination mission.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to “Ruhuna“ located east of the entrance of the “Lost Woods“.

m_vList.NAME: The Omen of the Dream 3
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ3
m_vList.DESC: Find the “Goblins’ Den“ in the “Lost Woods“./【Location】 Keep walking forward after entering the “Lost Woods“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Enter the “Goblins’ Den“ in the “Lost Woods“.

m_vList.NAME: The Omen of the Dream 4
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ4
m_vList.DESC: Find the “Red Cap“ inhabiting the “Goblins’ Den“./【Location】 Keep walking forward after entering the “Lost Woods“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Find the “Red Cap“ on the “Goblins’ Den“ 5F.

m_vList.NAME: The Omen of the Dream 5
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ5
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the “Red Cap“ inhabiting the “Goblins’ Den“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Avaricious Red Cap“ appearing on the “Goblins’ Den“ 5F.

m_vList.NAME: The Omen of the Dream 6
m_vList.KANA: ユメヘノキザシ6
m_vList.DESC: Report the defeat of the “Red Cap“ to Bill Berry.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to “Ruhuna“ located east of the entrance of the “Lost Woods“.

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン
m_vList.DESC: Go explore Olbius.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion 2
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン2
m_vList.DESC: Go ask Queen Cuphea on the “Fairy King’s Throne“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Talk to Queen Cuphea on the “Fairy King’s Throne“ on a big tree’s top.

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion 3
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン3
m_vList.DESC: Go to the “Glittering Hill“ as Queen Cuphea suggested./【Location】 Set off from the Gate of the “Fairyland“ to the east.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Enter the dungeon “Glittering Hill“ located east of the entrance of the “Fairyland“ (hill foot).

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion 4
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン4
m_vList.DESC: You encountered a monster as soon as you enter the “Glittering Hill“! Repel them.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Defeat the “Afanc Lurking in the Dark“ appearing in the “Glittering Hill“.

m_vList.NAME: Suggestion 5
m_vList.KANA: ジョゲン5
m_vList.DESC: Head for the depths of the “Glittering Hill“ as Queen Cuphea suggested.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Head for the “Glittering Hill“ 5F.

m_vList.NAME: Head Toward the World
m_vList.KANA: セカイヘノハバタキ
m_vList.DESC: Go to the Academy to talk to Bergamot Sensei.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Bergamot in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Head Toward the World 2
m_vList.KANA: セカイヘノハバタキ2
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the “Book of Magic“ required for the exam and get the approval for the short-term study abroad program.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the “Book of Magic“ to Bergamot./The ingredients are “Japanese Ash Branch“, “Puni Bead?“, “Heath Grass“ and “Water Lily“.

m_vList.NAME: Girl Carrying Things
m_vList.KANA: ハコビヤノショウジョ
m_vList.DESC: Go to Ribrum! Head forward and explore along the path.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Set off from the “Wharf“ to the northeast.

m_vList.NAME: Girl Carrying Things 2
m_vList.KANA: ハコビヤノショウジョ2
m_vList.DESC: Catch up with the girl carrying the painting.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Set off from “Rosa Maze“ in Ribrum to the east.

m_vList.NAME: Girl Carrying Things 3
m_vList.KANA: ハコビヤノショウジョ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster and rescue the girl.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Red Puni Attacking the Girl“ at the east of “Rosa Maze“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: Girl Carrying Things 4
m_vList.KANA: ハコビヤノショウジョ4
m_vList.DESC: Go with Angelica to “Rose Hip Mansion“ where the Lord of Ribrum lives.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to the garden of “Rose Hip Mansion“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: For Netl
m_vList.KANA: ネトルノタメニ
m_vList.DESC: Sorel seems to have come up with something. Talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: For Netl 2
m_vList.KANA: ネトルノタメニ2
m_vList.DESC: Find the caravan in Ribrum to get the ingredient for the medicine.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Find Fever Phew somewhere in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: For Netl 3
m_vList.KANA: ネトルノタメニ3
m_vList.DESC: Collect “Green Apples“ for Fever Phew to exchange for the material.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Give “Green Apple“ x2 to Fever Phew who is at the entrance of “Woofer“.

m_vList.NAME: For Netl 4
m_vList.KANA: ネトルノタメニ4
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the “Tonic“ and send it to Angelica in “Woofer“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Give the “Tonic“ to Angelica in “Woofer“.

m_vList.NAME: The Monster of Illusion
m_vList.KANA: ゲンジュツノマモノ
m_vList.DESC: You met Angelica again at “Rosa Maze“, but she seemed a bit weird? Something is wrong?
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to “Rosa Maze“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Monster of Illusion 2
m_vList.KANA: ゲンジュツノマモノ2
m_vList.DESC: Lord Rose Hip might be in danger. Rush to “Rose Hip Mansion“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Monster of Illusion 3
m_vList.KANA: ゲンジュツノマモノ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster appearing in “Rose Hip Mansion“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Cockatrice Attacking Rose Hip Mansion“ appearing in “Rose Hip Mansion“.

m_vList.NAME: The Monster of Illusion 4
m_vList.KANA: ゲンジュツノマモノ4
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the “Burnt-Out Paint“ and give it to Lord Rose Hip.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Give the “Burnt-Out Paint“ to Rose Hip./The ingredients are “Muscat“, “Neutralizer (Blue)“, Morning Dew Drop“ and “Fully-Ripe Apple“.

m_vList.NAME: Fight Ekinasea
m_vList.KANA: エキナセアトノタイケツ
m_vList.DESC: Follow Ekinasea to the “Seal of Brambles“./【Location】 Investigate the stone tablet in the depths of “Rosa Maze“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Investigate the back of the stone tablet in the depths of “Rosa Maze“ in Ribrum and enter the “Seal of Brambles“.

m_vList.NAME: Fight Ekinasea 2
m_vList.KANA: エキナセアトノタイケツ2
m_vList.DESC: Go deep into the “Seal of Brambles“ and find Ekinasea.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Find Ekinasea on the “Seal of Brambles“ 5F.

m_vList.NAME: Fight Ekinasea 3
m_vList.KANA: エキナセアトノタイケツ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster summoned by Ekinasea.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat “Ekinasea’s Masterpiece Cockatrice“ on the “Seal of Brambles“ 5F.

m_vList.NAME: Fight Ekinasea 4
m_vList.KANA: エキナセアトノタイケツ4
m_vList.DESC: You accepted the invitation from Lord Rose Hip. Go to “Rose Hip Mansion“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Hard Learning Wistyria
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアベンキョウチュウ
m_vList.DESC: Wistyria is learning hard on something. Talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Wistyria in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Hard Learning Wistyria 2
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアベンキョウチュウ2
m_vList.DESC: Enter the “Lost Woods“ to find the relic.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Olbius】 Enter the depths of the “Lost Woods“ and go to the “White Lotus Pool“.

m_vList.NAME: The Hard Learning Wistyria 3
m_vList.KANA: ウィスティリアベンキョウチュウ3
m_vList.DESC: You are surrounded by monsters! Defeat them.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Olbius】 Defeat the “Puni Puni Wearing an Aura“ appearing in the “White Lotus Pool“.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ
m_vList.DESC: Go find the shop of ore craftwork.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Visit the booth at the northeast of the walled town “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 2
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ2
m_vList.DESC: Find Varerian who is fleeing all around the town.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the entrance of the residence at the northwest of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria. Enter from “Gooru - West Gate“ and go north at the first crossing to find it.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 3
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ3
m_vList.DESC: Find Varerian who is fleeing all around the town.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the well at the south of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 4
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ4
m_vList.DESC: The arrow accidentally hit a monster!? Defeat it.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat the “Tearful Red Ooze“ appearing in front of the well at the south of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 5
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ5
m_vList.DESC: Find Varerian who is fleeing all around the town.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the entrance of the residence at the southeast of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria. Walk east from the well at the south.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 6
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ6
m_vList.DESC: Go retrieve the student ID card from Scalcap.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the entrance of the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: In Ateria 7
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアニテ7
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Bandits who obstruct you from entering the Trading House.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat the “Doorkeeper Bandits“ in front of the “Trading House“ at the center of Gooru.

m_vList.NAME: Red Warrior
m_vList.KANA: アカキセンシ
m_vList.DESC: Varerian is looking for you. Visit the “Trading House“ in Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Talk to Varerian in the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Red Warrior 2
m_vList.KANA: アカキセンシ2
m_vList.DESC: Go find the “troublemaker“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the entrance of the residence at the northwest of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Red Warrior 3
m_vList.KANA: アカキセンシ3
m_vList.DESC: Go to the “Calcus Graveyard“ to meet Red Clover.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Talk to Red Clover in the “Calcus Graveyard“.

m_vList.NAME: The Glass and the Mask
m_vList.KANA: サカズキトマスク
m_vList.DESC: Varerian is looking for you. Visit the “Trading House“ in Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Talk to Varerian in the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Glass and the Mask 2
m_vList.KANA: サカズキトマスク2
m_vList.DESC: Go to the “Rupes Deserted Mine“./【Location】 The entrance of the mine is north of the north gate of the town.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the “Rupes Deserted Mine“ 5F./The entrance of the “Rupes Deserted Mine“ is north of “Gooru - North Gate“.

m_vList.NAME: The Glass and the Mask 3
m_vList.KANA: サカズキトマスク3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster in the depths of the “Rupes Deserted Mine“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat the “Treasure Collector Giant Yellow Puni“ on the “Rupes Deserted Mine“ 5F.

m_vList.NAME: The Glass and the Mask 4
m_vList.KANA: サカズキトマスク4
m_vList.DESC: Give the “Mask“ and the “Glass“ to Scalcap.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Visit the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ
m_vList.DESC: Varerian seems a bit weird. Talk to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Talk to Varerian in the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger 2
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ2
m_vList.DESC: Rush to the “Hideout of the Dardala Company“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Enter the “Hideout of the Dardala Company“ in the “Calcus Graveyard“.

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger 3
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monsters attacking Scalcap and his men.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat “A Swarm of Gray Spiders“ appearing in the “Hideout of the Dardala Company“.

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger 4
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ4
m_vList.DESC: Defeat Black Korsh who revealed his true nature.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat the “Traitor Black Korsh“ appearing in the “Hideout of the Dardala Company“.

m_vList.NAME: Dad Is in Danger 5
m_vList.KANA: オヤジノキキ5
m_vList.DESC: Go meet Scalcap at the “Trading House“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Talk to Scalcap at the “Trading House“.

m_vList.NAME: The Wizardry-Alchemy Debate
m_vList.KANA: マホウレンキンジュツロンソウ
m_vList.DESC: Check the status of the new students with Sorel.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Wizardry-Alchemy Debate 2
m_vList.KANA: マホウレンキンジュツロンソウ2
m_vList.DESC: Have a fight to see which is better, wizardry or alchemy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: The Wizardry-Alchemy Debate 3
m_vList.KANA: マホウレンキンジュツロンソウ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster chasing Sorel.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Wolf Wounded in the Tail“ near the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: The Wizardry-Alchemy Debate 4
m_vList.KANA: マホウレンキンジュツロンソウ4
m_vList.DESC: Prepare the “Healing Salve“ for Sorel.
m_vList.CONDITION: Synthesize the “Healing Salve“ for Sorel./The ingredients are “Heath Grass“ and “Morning Dew Drop“./“Morning Dew Drops“ can only be gathered in the morning.

m_vList.NAME: Sorel’s Request
m_vList.KANA: ソレルノオネガイ
m_vList.DESC: Sorel seems to be upset... Talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Sorel’s Request 2
m_vList.KANA: ソレルノオネガイ2
m_vList.DESC: Gather the “Heath Grass“ for Sorel.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the “Heath Grass“ to Sorel./They can be gathered from grass.

m_vList.NAME: Sorel’s Request 3
m_vList.KANA: ソレルノオネガイ3
m_vList.DESC: Gain the material needed for the wizardology class.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: Sorel’s Request 4
m_vList.KANA: ソレルノオネガイ4
m_vList.DESC: Defeat those monsters who may drop the material needed for the wizardology class.
m_vList.CONDITION: Some “Puni-Puni-Like Creature Puni Punis?“ appeared near the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“. Go defeat them.

m_vList.NAME: Sorel’s Request 5
m_vList.KANA: ソレルノオネガイ5
m_vList.DESC: Give the “Puni Bead?“ dropped by the “Puni Puni?“ to Sorel.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the “Puni Bead?“ to Sorel. If you want more, the monster “Puni Puni?“ near the Academy can drop this kind of rare material.

m_vList.NAME: The Sage Anis
m_vList.KANA: ケンジャアニス
m_vList.DESC: Anis seems to be upset about something... Talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Anis in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Sage Anis 2
m_vList.KANA: ケンジャアニス2
m_vList.DESC: Anis commissions you to bring her the “Iron Ore“, an ingredient for “Reclamation Shovels“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the “Iron Ore“ to Anis in the Academy./They can be gathered from stones.

m_vList.NAME: The Sage Anis 3
m_vList.KANA: ケンジャアニス3
m_vList.DESC: Anis wants to try the “Reclamation Shovel“. Follow her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: The Sage Anis 4
m_vList.KANA: ケンジャアニス4
m_vList.DESC: Help the student attacked by the monster.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Wolf Attacking the Student“ near the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: The Academy Boldness Tournament
m_vList.KANA: アカデミーリュウドキョウダメシ
m_vList.DESC: Join the Boldness Tournament with Sorel and others.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Academy Boldness Tournament 2
m_vList.KANA: アカデミーリュウドキョウダメシ2
m_vList.DESC: Go find the Puni appearing near the Academy which is said to be very strong.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: The Academy Boldness Tournament 3
m_vList.KANA: アカデミーリュウドキョウダメシ3
m_vList.DESC: You found the Puni, whose features match the rumor! Defeat it.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Target of the Boldness Tournament? Purple Puni“ appearing south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: The Request of the Headmaster
m_vList.KANA: ガクエンチョウノタノミ
m_vList.DESC: Jones Wort Sensei seems to want to talk to you. Go to the Academy to find him.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Jones Wort in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Request of the Headmaster 2
m_vList.KANA: ガクエンチョウノタノミ2
m_vList.DESC: Go investigate the “White Lotus Pool“, which is located in the deepest part of the “Lost Woods“./【Location】 Just follow Peppermint’s guidance.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go deep into the “Lost Woods“ and go to the “White Lotus Pool“./Enter the depths of the ’Lost Woods“ following the fairy’s guidance.

m_vList.NAME: Care for the Wings
m_vList.KANA: ハネノオテイレ
m_vList.DESC: Go explore Olbius.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: Care for the Wings 2
m_vList.KANA: ハネノオテイレ2
m_vList.DESC: It seems “Green Apples“ are needed to smooth out the wrinkles on Peppermint’s wings. Go gather it.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the “Green Apple“ to Anis in front of “Oregano’s Cabin“./They can be gathered from apple trees.

m_vList.NAME: Catnip’s Song 2
m_vList.KANA: キャットニップノウタ2
m_vList.DESC: Make an item that can recover Catnip’s throat.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Give the “Honey Drop“ to Catnip in “Rosa Maze“./The ingredients are “Mysterious Milk“, “Honey“ and “puniball“.

m_vList.NAME: Disastrous Monster Lv.15
m_vList.KANA: サイヤクノマモノレベル15
m_vList.DESC: 【Multi Battle】 Go defeat the disastrous monster appearing in “Path 1 of Ribrum“./“Path 1 of Ribrum“ is located east of the “Wharf“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Disastrous Monster“ appearing in “Path 1 of Ribrum“./The monster will appear only when you choose the “Multi“ option to “Explore“.

m_vList.NAME: 【Practice】 Gain the Red Intermediate Ingredient
m_vList.KANA: レンシュウアカイチュウカンソザイノニュウシュ
m_vList.DESC: Try to synthesize the “Neutralizer (Red)“. Neutralizers can be used in all kinds of syntheses. You can prepare more of them.
m_vList.CONDITION: Synthesize “Gelatines“ and “Obsidians“./“Gelatines“ can be gained from Puni Punis./“Obsidians“ can be gathered from stones.

m_vList.NAME: 【Practice】 Gain Bomb
m_vList.KANA: レンシュウフラムノニュウシュ
m_vList.DESC: Try to synthesize the “Bomb“. Bombs can be used in battles, as well as to destroy the fallen trees or barrels on the field.
m_vList.CONDITION: Synthesize “Neutralizers (Red)“, “Obsidians“ and “Japanese Ash Branches“./“Neutralizers (Red)“ can be synthesized using “Gelatines“ and “Obsidians“.

m_vList.NAME: 【Practice】 Gain Ice Bomb
m_vList.KANA: レンシュウレヘルンノニュウシュ
m_vList.DESC: Try to synthesize the “Ice Bomb“. Ice Bombs can be used in battles, as well as to freeze the rivers on the field.
m_vList.CONDITION: Synthesize “Neutralizers (Red)“, “Ice-Cold Stones“ and “Japanese Ash Branches“./“Neutralizers (Red)“ can be synthesized using “Gelatines“ and “Obsidians“.

m_vList.NAME: Search for Sister
m_vList.KANA: オネエチャンヲサガシテ
m_vList.DESC: Angelica seems to be lost. Go to “Woofer“ now.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to “Woofer“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: Search for Sister 2
m_vList.KANA: オネエチャンヲサガシテ2
m_vList.DESC: Where on earth is Angelica... Search the whole Ribrum for her.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go search for Angelica, who should be in somewhere in Ribrum./It’s said that someone saw Angelica in “Rosa Maze“... Go deep into Rosa Maze“ to search for her.

m_vList.NAME: Search for Sister 3
m_vList.KANA: オネエチャンヲサガシテ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster which wants to attack Angelica.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Cockatrice Jumping out from the Painting“ appearing in “Rosa Maze“.

m_vList.NAME: 【Exchange】 Submit Rose Petal
m_vList.KANA: コウカンバラノハナビラノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange “Rose Petal“ x2 for “Detox Medicine“ x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Rose Petal“ x2./They can be gathered from the flowers in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: 【Exchange】 Submit Neutralizer (Blue)
m_vList.KANA: コウカンチュウワザイアオノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange “Neutralizer (Blue)“ x2 for “Neutralizer (Red)“ x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Neutralizer (Blue)“ x2./The ingredients are “Gelatines“ and “Fish Scales“.

m_vList.NAME: 【Exchange】 Submit Mushroom
m_vList.KANA: コウカンマッシュルームノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange “Mushroom“ x2 for “Honey“ x2, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Mushroom“ x2./They can be gathered from the mushrooms in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: Angelica’s Resolution
m_vList.KANA: アンゼリカノケツイ
m_vList.DESC: Invite Sorel to explore with you.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Angelica’s Resolution 2
m_vList.KANA: アンゼリカノケツイ2
m_vList.DESC: Go to Angelica’s home in Woofer to check it out.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to “Woofer“.

m_vList.NAME: Angelica’s Resolution 3
m_vList.KANA: アンゼリカノケツイ3
m_vList.DESC: Go to the “Seal of Brambles“ to gather the material that Angelica wants.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Young Treat“ on the “Seal of Brambles“ 1F and gain the “Treant’s Branch“.

m_vList.NAME: Angelica’s Resolution 4
m_vList.KANA: アンゼリカノケツイ4
m_vList.DESC: Give the “Treant’s Branch“ to Angelica in “Woofer“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Give the “Treant’s Branch“ to Angelica. If you want more, the monster “Upper Floor Boss Treant“ on the “Seal of Brambles“ B10F may drop this kind of rare material.

m_vList.NAME: Angelica’s Resolution 5
m_vList.KANA: アンゼリカノケツイ5
m_vList.DESC: Invite Sorel to explore with you.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sorel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Angelica’s Resolution 6
m_vList.KANA: アンゼリカノケツイ6
m_vList.DESC: Go to “Woofer“ to meet Angelica.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to “Woofer“.

m_vList.NAME: Angelica’s Resolution 7
m_vList.KANA: アンゼリカノケツイ7
m_vList.DESC: Go to “Rose Hip Mansion“ to meet Lord Rose Hip.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: 【Trial】 Seal of Brambles
m_vList.KANA: シレンイバラノケッカイ
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the Boss “Upper Floor Boss Treant“./【Special Reward】 Unlock the middle floors of the dungeon (11F–20F) and the lower floors of the dungeon (21F–30F).
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Upper Floor Boss Treant“ on the “Seal of Brambles“ B10F.

m_vList.NAME: The Rosa Maze Incident
m_vList.KANA: ローサメイズジヘン
m_vList.DESC: To receive the commission from the minstrel Catnip, go wait in front of “Rosa Maze“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Talk to Catnip in “Rosa Maze“.

m_vList.NAME: The Rosa Maze Accident 2
m_vList.KANA: ローサメイズジヘン2
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster appearing in “Rosa Maze“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat 5 “Numbing Myconids Overflowing from the Maze“ appearing in “Rosa Maze“.

m_vList.KANA: フィーバーノユメ
m_vList.DESC: Fever Phew seems to have come to Ribrum. Go greet him.

m_vList.DESC: Prepare the products for sale for Fever Weaver.

m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Burnt-Out Paint“ x2./The ingredients are “Muscat“, “Neutralizer (Blue)“, Morning Dew Drop“ and “Fully-Ripe Apple“.

m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to “Woofer“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.KANA: オタガイノユメ2
m_vList.DESC: Synthesize the “Zettel“ and give it to the teenager.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Give the “Zettel“ to the teenager in “Woofer“./The ingredients are “Japanese Ash Branches“ and “Fresh Leaves“.

m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.KANA: ヤマイノローズヒップ2
m_vList.DESC: Lord Rose Hip seems to be ill... Make medicine and bring it to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Give the “Mental Water“ with a quality value of at least 30 to Netl at the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“.

m_vList.NAME: Netl Making Desserts
m_vList.KANA: ネトルノオカシヅクリ
m_vList.DESC: You received a commission from Netl. Go to “Rose Hip Mansion“ to learn the details.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: Netl Making Desserts 2

m_vList.DESC: Collect the ingredient for the dessert that Netl wants.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Give “Wheat“ x2 to Netl at the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“./They can be gathered from the grasses in Olbius.

m_vList.NAME: Disastrous Monster Lv.20
m_vList.KANA: サイヤクノマモノレベル20
m_vList.DESC: 【Multi Battle】 Go defeat the disastrous monster appearing in “Path 2 of Ribrum“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Disastrous Monster“ appearing in “Path 2 of Ribrum“./Disastrous monsters will appear only in “Multi“ mode.

m_vList.DESC: Go visit Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Walk northeast along the road starting from the entrance of “Woofer“, and then walk east along “Path 3 of Ribrum“ to go to Ateria.

m_vList.DESC: You can exchange the “Book of Magic“ for the recipe of “Iron Ingot“, one time only.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit the “Book of Magic“./The ingredients are “Japanese Ash Branch“, “Puni Bead?“, “Heath Grass“ and “Water Lily“.

m_vList.NAME: 【Exchange】 Submit Puni Bead?
m_vList.KANA: コウカンプニタマハテナノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: You can exchange “Puni Bead?“ x2 for “Mental Bottle“ x2, one time only.

m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Golden Puni Bead“ x2./The monster “Golden Puni“ on the lower floors of the “Goblins’ Den“ may drop this kind of rare material.

m_vList.DESC: Go meet Varerian.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Talk to Varerian in the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Talk to Varerian in the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.KANA: アイノセンシ2
m_vList.DESC: Go find the “troublemaker“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the well at the south of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.DESC: You were attacked by the fleeing Bandits! Defeat them and clam them down.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat the “Fleeing Bandits“ appearing in front of the well at the south of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.DESC: Go to the Trading House of Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Visit the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.DESC: Go collect the material for repairing the machine.

m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Talk to Bill Berry in the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.DESC: Give Bill Berry the medicine he wants.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Give the “Healing Salve“ with a quality value of at least 60 (★3) to Bill Berry in the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Lodes of Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノコウミャク
m_vList.DESC: Go to the Trading House of Ateria.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Visit the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Give the “Bomb“ to the man in the “Trading House“ at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.CONDITION: 【Olbius】 Talk to Bill Berry in “Ruhuna“.

m_vList.NAME: Disastrous Monster Lv.35

m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Puni Bead?“ from the Commission Quest.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Silk Thread

m_vList.DESC: Submit “Silk Thread“ x3 from the Commission Quest.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Cloth Piece

m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Cloth Piece“ from the Commission Quest.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit the “Cloth Piece“./They can be gained from the monster “Gray Ooze“ that appears in the daytime.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Morning Dew Drop

m_vList.DESC: Defeat the “Giant Chocolate Puni (Lv.60)“ in front of Rose Hip Mansion in Ribrum. ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Giant Chocolate Puni (Lv.60)“ in front of Rose Hip Mansion.

m_vList.NAME: Hunt Giant Chocolate Puni 3
m_vList.KANA: デカチョコプニトウバツ3
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the “Giant Chocolate Puni (Lv.80)“ in front of Rose Hip Mansion in Ribrum. ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Giant Chocolate Puni (Lv.80)“ in front of Rose Hip Mansion.

m_vList.NAME: 【Primary】 Spoon Quest
m_vList.KANA: ショキュウスプーンクエスト
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the “Wolf of Spoon“ appearing in the Fairyland. ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Defeat the “Wolf of Spoon (Lv.10)“ appearing in the West.

m_vList.NAME: 【Medium】 Spoon Quest
m_vList.KANA: チュウキュウスプーンクエスト
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the “Giant Puni of Spoon“ appearing in the Fairyland. ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Defeat the “Giant Puni of Spoon (Lv.20)“ appearing in the West.

m_vList.NAME: 【Advanced】 Spoon Quest
m_vList.KANA: ジョウキュウスプーンクエスト
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the “Treant of Spoon“ appearing in the Fairyland. ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Defeat the “Treant of Spoon (Lv.40)“ appearing in the West.

m_vList.NAME: 【Super】 Spoon Quest
m_vList.KANA: チョウキュウスプーンクエスト
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the “Hobgoblin of Spoon“ appearing in the Fairyland. ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Defeat the “Hobgoblin of Spoon (Lv.60)“ appearing in the West.

m_vList.NAME: 【Free】 Spoon Quest 1

m_vList.DESC: Defeat the “Wolf of Spoon“ appearing in the Fairyland. ※Once per day.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Defeat the “Wolf of Spoon (Lv.20)“ appearing in the Fairyland.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Totori’s Adventure License
m_vList.KANA: トトリノボウケンメンキョショウノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Totori’s Adventure License“ with a quality value of 100. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit the “Totori’s Adventure License“ with a quality value of 100./You can gain them from “Middle Floor Boss Blue Caps“ on the “Goblins’ Den“ 20F and then increase their quality by enhancement.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Totori’s Brooch
m_vList.KANA: トトリノブローチノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Totori’s Brooch“ with a quality value of 100. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit the “Totori’s Brooch“ with a quality value of 100./You can gain them from “Middle Floor Boss Ents“ on the “Seal of Brambles“ 20F and then increase their quality by enhancement.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Totori’s Necklace
m_vList.KANA: トトリノネックレスノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Totori’s Necklace“ with a quality value of 100. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit the “Totori’s Necklace“ with a quality value of 100./You can gain them from “Middle Floor Boss Ungoliants“ on the “Hideout of the Dardala Company“ 20F and then increase their quality by enhancement.

m_vList.NAME: Prologue
m_vList.KANA: プロローグ
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Peppermint who is brushing her feathers in the Academy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Peppermint in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Go to the Ruhuna Village
m_vList.KANA: ルフナムラヘ
m_vList.DESC: Go to Ruhuna to gather the information of the Dragons.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Olbius】 Go to the entrance of “Ruhuna“.

m_vList.NAME: Damage to the Ruhuna Village
m_vList.KANA: ルフナムラノヒガイ
m_vList.DESC: In order to repel the large number of monsters appearing in Ruhuna, go synthesize the monster repellent items and send them to Bill Berry in the Ruhuna Village.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Olbius】 Send “Frightening Urchin“ x2 to Bill Berry in “Ruhuna“./The ingredients are “Fairy Butter“, “Mandragora Root“ and “Urchin“.

m_vList.NAME: The Monsters Attacking the Ruhuna Village
m_vList.KANA: ルフナムラヲオソウマモノ
m_vList.DESC: Help eliminate the large number of monsters appearing in Ruhuna.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Olbius】 Go to the “Entrance of Ruhuna“ near the entrance of the “Lost Woods“.

m_vList.NAME: The Monsters Attacking the Ruhuna Village 2
m_vList.KANA: ルフナムラヲオソウマモノ２
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the large number of monsters appearing in Ruhuna.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Olbius】 Defeat the “Apostle (Lv.25)“ appearing at the “Entrance of Ruhuna“.

m_vList.NAME: The Incident of Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: リブルムノイヘン
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Tandrion who is preparing in a hurry in the Academy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Tandrion in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Go to Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: リブルムヘ
m_vList.DESC: The monsters in Ribrum seem to have become active. Go to Rose Hip Mansion to collect the information first.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“.

m_vList.NAME: Mimi, the Adventurer from Another World
m_vList.KANA: イセカイノボウケンシャミミ
m_vList.DESC: Give the “Healing Water“ to Mimi.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Give the “Healing Water“ to Mimi at the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“./Gain a “Glittering Dew Drop“ in Ateria to unlock the recipe.

m_vList.NAME: The Monster Attacking Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: リブルムヲオソウマモノ
m_vList.DESC: Find the monster that wounded Mimi.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Go to the “Entrance of the Seal of Brambles“.

m_vList.NAME: The Monster Attacking Ribrum 2
m_vList.KANA: リブルムヲオソウマモノ２
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster that wounded Mimi.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ribrum】 Defeat the “Alien Dragon“ appearing at the “Entrance of the Seal of Brambles“.

m_vList.NAME: The Incident of Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアノイヘン
m_vList.DESC: Ru and Sterk are talking about something in the Academy, looking serious. Go ask them what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Go to Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアヘ
m_vList.DESC: It seems the Dardala Company is watching over the Dragon appearing in Ateria. Go ask Scalcap about the details.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the “Trading House“. The “Trading House“ is located at the center of the town of “Gooru“ in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: Prepare for the Dragon Hunt
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴントウバツニソナエテ
m_vList.DESC: Get prepared for the Dragon hunt while investigating it.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Give “Ice Bomb“ x5 with a quality value of at least 50 to Scalcap in the “Trading House“.

m_vList.NAME: Confronting the Dragon
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴントノタイメン
m_vList.DESC: Go to the place where the Dardala Company is watching over the Dragon.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the “Rupes Deserted Mine“ 5F.

m_vList.NAME: Space-Time Distortion and the Monster
m_vList.KANA: ジクウノユガミトマモノ
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the monster that appeared due to the space-time distortion.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat the “Apostle (Lv.30) appearing on the ““Rupes Deserted Mine“ 5F.

m_vList.NAME: Go to the Fairyland
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイキョウヘ
m_vList.DESC: Ru may know something about the scales dropped by the Dragon. Talk to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Words of the Fairy King
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイオウノハナシ
m_vList.DESC: The Fairy King may know how to defeat the Dragon. Go ask the Fairy King Thunbergia in the Fairyland.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Talk to the Fairy King Thunbergia on the “Fairy King’s Throne“.

m_vList.NAME: Test of the Fairy King
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイオウカラノシキンセキ
m_vList.DESC: Challenge the assignment from the Fairy King Thunbergia and show your real strength.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Give the “Warrior’s Secret Potion“ with a quality value of at least 60 to the Fairy King Thunbergia on the “Fairy King’s Throne“.

m_vList.NAME: In Order to Make the Item
m_vList.KANA: ドウグヲツクルタメニ
m_vList.DESC: In order to make the item used to seal the Dragon’s power, go awaken the sealed monster.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Go to the “Glittering Hill“ 30F.

m_vList.NAME: In Order to Make the Item 2
m_vList.KANA: ドウグヲツクルタメニ２
m_vList.DESC: Defeat the sealed “Alien Demon“ and gain the item.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Fairyland】 Defeat the “Alien Demon (Lv.40)“ on the “Glittering Hill“ 30F.

m_vList.NAME: Make the Trump Card
m_vList.KANA: キリフダノサクセイ
m_vList.DESC: Everyone of the Academy is busy preparing for the Dragon hunt operation. Go find Ru to get the update.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Complete the Trump Card
m_vList.KANA: キリフダノカンセイ
m_vList.DESC: Complete the trump card to defeat the Dragon. This weapon can seal the Dragon’s power.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the “Valkyrie Arm“ to Peppermint in the Academy./The ingredients can be checked from the recipe. One of the ingredients “Evil Horn“ can be gained from “Alien Demons“ on the “Glittering Hill“ 30F in the Fairyland.

m_vList.NAME: Go to the Dragon’s Den
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴンノスヘ
m_vList.DESC: Everything is ready to defeat the Dragon. Go to its den now before it causes more damage.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to entrance of the Arter Tunnel on the “Mountain Path“.

m_vList.NAME: The Depths of the Den
m_vList.KANA: スノオクチデ
m_vList.DESC: You can feel the growing Dragon’s power. The Dragon is right there...
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Go to the depths of the Arter Tunnel on the “Mountain Path“.

m_vList.NAME: Hunt the Dragon
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴンノトウバツ
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the source of the abnormalities in bressisle—the Dragon “Iguanas“.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat “Iguanas (Lv.50)“ in the depths of the Arter Tunnel on the “Mountain Path“.

m_vList.NAME: Ending
m_vList.KANA: エピローグ
m_vList.DESC: Now that the Dragon is defeated, everything should have returned to normal and bressisle should have regained peace...... But there seems to be some disturbance in the Academy.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Peppermint in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Hunt the Dragon Lv.1
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴントウバツ Lv1
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the Dragon “Iguanas (Lv.50)“. ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat “Iguanas (Lv.50)“ in the depths of the Arter Tunnel on the “Mountain Path“.

m_vList.NAME: Hunt the Dragon Lv.2
m_vList.KANA: ドラゴントウバツ Lv2
m_vList.DESC: Go defeat the Dragon “Iguanas (Lv.70)“. ※Can be cleared repeatedly.
m_vList.CONDITION: 【Ateria】 Defeat “Iguanas (Lv.70)“ in the depths of the Arter Tunnel on the “Mountain Path“.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Valkyrie Arm
m_vList.KANA: ヴァルキリーアームノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Valkyrie Arm“ with a quality value of 100. ※Only once.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit the “Valkyrie Arm“ with a quality value of 100.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Mace of Olbius
m_vList.KANA: オルビュースのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Mace of Olbius“ with a quality value of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit a “Mace of Olbius“ with a quality value of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from “Hobgoblins“ on the “Goblins’ Den“ 30F.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Mace of Ribrum
m_vList.KANA: リブルムのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Mace of Ribrum“ with a quality value of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit a “Mace of Ribrum“ with a quality value of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from “Apple Treemen“ on the “Seal of Brambles“ 30F.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Mace of Ateria
m_vList.KANA: アーテリアのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Mace of Ateria“ with a quality value of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit a “Mace of Ateria“ with a quality value of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from “Queen Spiders“ on the “Hideout of the Dardala Company“ 30F.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Mace of the Fairyland
m_vList.KANA: ヨウセイキョウのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Mace of the Fairyland“ with a quality value of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit a “Mace of the Fairyland“ with a quality value of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from “Giant Yellow Punis“ on the “Glittering Hill“ 30F.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Mace of Eruleum
m_vList.KANA: エルレウムのメイスのノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the “Mace of Eruleum“ with a quality value of at least 80. ※Only once during the event.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit a “Mace of Eruleum“ with a quality value of at least 80./The main ingredients can be gained from “Pialays“ on the “Undersea Shrine“ 30F.

m_vList.KANA: コウリンバトルボリューム1　レベル15

m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Descent Lv.15 - Wind Dragon“ of the Descent Battle. 【Recommended Strength: at least 1,000】

m_vList.NAME: Hunt Mini Golem
m_vList.KANA: ミニゴーレムノトウバツ
m_vList.DESC: This is an ecological report of the “Mini Golem’’. Go defeat some “Mini Golems“. Report is not required.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 5 “Mini Golems“./It can be found in the dungeon in Flares. ※Monsters whose name has a prefix are not included.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward] The Efficacy of Leeks
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウリーキシュウシュウカ
m_vList.DESC: Cooking, treating colds, viewing... You can never have too many leeks, so bring plenty of them!
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Leek“ x3.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward] For Uni Throw
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウウニナゲノタメニ
m_vList.DESC: I lost to the “Goblin“ in the Uni Throw Contest... I must win this time, so please bring me some Unis for practice!
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Uni“ x3.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward] Grilling Beast Meat
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウケモノノニクノヤキカゲン
m_vList.DESC: Uh... The meat quickly became charred. Please prepare some Beast Meat to make sure it’s perfectly cooked.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Beast Meat“ x3.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward] Research on Red Puni Beads
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウアカプニダマケンキュウ
m_vList.DESC: We are investigating on the difference between the Red Puni Bead and the Blue Puni Bead. Please bring some Red puniballs to prevent mistakes due to individual differences.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Red Puni Bead“ x3.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward - Advanced] The Leek Collector
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウジョウキュウリーキシュウシュウカ
m_vList.DESC: Young leeks, vintage leeks, and even dying leeks are all wonderful and unique.... I don’t care what kind, just show me many leeks!
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Leek“ x7.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward - Advanced] For Piling Up Unis
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウジョウキュウウニツミノタメニ
m_vList.DESC: The “Goblin“ piled up many Unis, which looks fun. Please bring many of them for me to play!
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Uni“ x7.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward - Advanced] Stock Up
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウジョウキュウオミセノシイレ
m_vList.DESC: I’ve been grilling and selling meat, but lately it’s been lacking in impact. Bring me some meat that I can sell as a new product!
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Beast Meat“ x7.

m_vList.NAME: [Ingredient Reward - Advanced] Further Research on Red Puni Beads
m_vList.KANA: ショクザイホウシュウジョウキュウアカプニダマツイキュウ
m_vList.DESC: Puni Puni, Puni Puni Puni Puni... Hah, this is a big study! Please bring me more Red Puni Beads for further research!!
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Red Puni Bead“ x7.

m_vList.NAME: Submit Good Uni Pouch
m_vList.KANA: コウヒンシツナウニブクロノノウヒン
m_vList.DESC: Submit the good “Uni Pouch“. ※You can still challenge this quest the next day or later after clearing or abandoning this quest.
m_vList.CONDITION: Submit “Uni Pouch“ x1 with a quality value of at least 60./“Unis“ can be gathered from trees and grasses./Good “Cloth Pieces“ can be gained from Commission Quests.

m_vList.NAME: The Breakthrough Quest - Intro
m_vList.KANA: ゲンカイトッパクエストイントロ
m_vList.DESC: It seems Silver Birch Sensei is going to explain the Breakthrough. Go listen to it.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Silver Birch Sensei.

m_vList.NAME: The Breakthrough Quest~ Olbius~
m_vList.KANA: ゲンカイトッパクエストオルビュース
m_vList.DESC: Let’s go to the most familiar place to test and train your skills! You can gain the Limit Candy Shards only once.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 3 “Goblins“./It can be found in Olbius.

m_vList.NAME: The Breakthrough Quest~ The Fairyland~
m_vList.KANA: ゲンカイトッパクエストヨウセイキョウ
m_vList.DESC: Let’s train under the tree swaying in fantasy! You can gain the Limit Candy Shards only once. ※You need to be able to visit the Fairyland to clear this quest.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 3 “Imps“./It can be found in the Fairyland.

m_vList.NAME: The Breakthrough Quest~ Ribrum~
m_vList.KANA: ゲンカイトッパクエストリブルム
m_vList.DESC: Let’s train in the place surrounded by roses! You can gain the Limit Candy Shards only once. ※You need to be able to visit Ribrum to clear this quest.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 3 “Gray Frogs“./It can be found in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Breakthrough Quest~ Ateria~
m_vList.KANA: ゲンカイトッパクエストアーテリア
m_vList.DESC: Let’s run through the Bandits and train! You can gain the Limit Candy Shards only once. ※You need to be able to visit Ateria to clear this quest.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 3 “Bandit“./Their headquarters is located in Ateria.

m_vList.NAME: The Breakthrough Quest~ Eruleum~
m_vList.KANA: ゲンカイトッパクエストエルレウム
m_vList.DESC: Let’s train in the land of sea breeze! You can gain the Limit Candy Shards only once. ※You need to be able to visit Eruleum to clear this quest.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 3 “Mermaids“./It can be found in the “Mermaid Rock“ in Eruleum.

m_vList.NAME: The Breakthrough Quest~ Flares~
m_vList.KANA: ゲンカイトッパクエストフラーレス
m_vList.DESC: Let’s train in the place of elegance and beauty! You can gain the Limit Candy Shards only once. ※You need to be able to visit Flares to clear this quest.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 3 “Troits“./It can be found in Flares.

m_vList.NAME: The Breakthrough Quest~ Mirror Ribrum~
m_vList.KANA: ゲンカイトッパクエスト
m_vList.DESC: Let’s go to the world where the minions of the Demon King roam! You can gain the Limit Candy Shards only once.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat 3 “Gray Frogs of the Mirror“./It can be found in the Mirror Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Thing Sophie Is Not Good At
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノニガテナモノ
m_vList.DESC: Sophie seems to be looking at the bulletin board...? Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Thing Sophie Is Not Good At 2
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノニガテナモノ２
m_vList.DESC: It seems Sophie has accepted a commission of killing monsters which she is not good at. We can’t leave her alone. Go to the “Lost Woods“ to help her kill the monster.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the “Lost Woods“ in Olbius.

m_vList.NAME: The Thing Sophie Is Not Good At 3
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノニガテナモノ３
m_vList.DESC: The monster of the commission has appeared in the “Lost Woods“. Defeat the “Banshee“ for the scared Sophie.
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Bitter Banshee“ in the “Lost Woods“ in Olbius.

m_vList.NAME: The Operation of Thinking Up Recipes
m_vList.KANA: レシピハッソウダイサクセン
m_vList.DESC: Sophie seems to be troubled by something? Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Operation of Thinking Up Recipes 2
m_vList.KANA: レシピハッソウダイサクセン２
m_vList.DESC: Sophie wants to think up many recipes for her friends. To broaden the view, go to the entrance of the “Rosa Maze“ in Ribrum.
m_vList.CONDITION: Go to the entrance of the “Rosa Maze“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: The Operation of Thinking Up Recipes 3
m_vList.KANA: レシピハッソウダイサクセン３
m_vList.DESC: You went to the entrance of the “Rosa Maze“ in Ribrum with Sophie, and got attacked by a group of Punis! There is no other choice, let’s kill the “Red Punis“!
m_vList.CONDITION: Defeat the “Group-Living Red Punis“ at the entrance of the “Rosa Maze“ in Ribrum.

m_vList.NAME: Sophie’s Hometown
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノコキョウ
m_vList.DESC: Sophie seems to be doing some research. Go talk to her and see how is it going.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Sophie’s Eureka Moment
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノヒラメキ
m_vList.DESC: Sophie seems upset gain. Maybe she has some trouble, let’s go ask her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Sophie’s Eureka Moment 2
m_vList.KANA: ソフィーノヒラメキ２
m_vList.DESC: Sophie wants to make an alchemical cauldron. Make an alchemical furnace...? Although it puzzles you, let’s prepare the material “Silver Ingot“ for her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good “Silver Ingot“ x2 (quality 60) to Sophie in the Academy./The ingredients are “Sea Star“, “Mermaid’s Tear“, “Scrap Iron“ and “Iron Ingot“.

m_vList.NAME: The Alchemy of Happiness
m_vList.KANA: シアワセノレンキンジュツ
m_vList.DESC: Sophie keeps staring at the newly made alchemical cauldron. Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Sophie in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Alchemy of Happiness 2
m_vList.KANA: シアワセノレンキンジュツ２
m_vList.DESC: It seems Sophie wants to synthesize an incredible item. Help her get the material “Earth Dragon’s Secret Potion“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the good “Earth Dragon’s Secret Potion“ (quality 60) to Sophie in the Academy./The ingredients are “Yellow Neutralizer“, “Mandragora Root“ and “Rotten Bone“.

m_vList.NAME: The Curry Alchemist?
m_vList.KANA: カレーナルレンキンジュツシ？
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Lulua, a girl with a dim smell of curry, who has come to the Academy through the space-time distortion.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Riddle and the Girl
m_vList.KANA: リドルトショウジョ
m_vList.DESC: Lulua seems to be staring at a book. Go ask her what she is reading.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: There Must Be a Way!
m_vList.KANA: ナントカナルナル！
m_vList.DESC: Lulua’s mantra is “there must be a way!“. Go ask her about this mantra.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: In Search of Aesthetic Curry
m_vList.KANA: タンビナルカレーヲモトメテ
m_vList.DESC: Lulua is looking at us. It seems she needs some help. Go ask her about it.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: In Search of Aesthetic Curry 2
m_vList.KANA: タンビナルカレーヲモトメテ２
m_vList.DESC: To help Lulua who wishes to know the curry of this world, give her the “Fully-Ripe Apple“, the classic and secret ingredient for the curry.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give the “Fully-Ripe Apple“ to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: A Young Mother!?
m_vList.KANA: トシシタノオカアサン！？
m_vList.DESC: Lulua is in the Academy and seems very happy. Go ask her how is she doing.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: In Search of Elegant Curry
m_vList.KANA: ユウガナルカレーヲモトメテ
m_vList.DESC: Lulua has an extremely mysterious look on her face. Go ash her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: In Search of Elegant Curry 2
m_vList.KANA: ユウガナルカレーヲモトメテ２
m_vList.DESC: Lulua wants to discover the essence of curry. Give her the secret ingredient “Comfrey“ that she wants.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give “Comfrey“ x3 to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Spice of Affinity
m_vList.KANA: キズナノスパイス
m_vList.DESC: Lulua seems to be worrying about something. It’s probably about the curry. Just in case, let’s ask her what’s wrong.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Lulua in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Spice of Affinity 2
m_vList.KANA: キズナノスパイス２
m_vList.DESC: Give the ingredient “Leek Soup“ to Lulua, who wants to make the best curry in the world.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good “Leek Soup“ (quality 60) x3 to Lulua in the Academy./The ingredients are “Leek“ and “Salmon“.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Revisit!?
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノサイホウ！？
m_vList.DESC: Rorona, who has grown up, has come to the Academy again!? Go talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Growth
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノセイチョウ
m_vList.DESC: Sorel and the others seem to be worrying about Rorona who has grown up... Anyway let’s talk to Rorona first.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Skills
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノウデマエ
m_vList.DESC: Rorona is talking with Hazel. Go talk to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Skills 2
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノウデマエ２
m_vList.DESC: To help Rorona who has accepted the alchemical commission, give the ingredient “Obsidian“ to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give “Obsidian“ x5 to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Passion
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノジョウネツ
m_vList.DESC: Sorel seems to be worried about Rorona who has grown up. Talk to Rorona first.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Attitude
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノシセイ
m_vList.DESC: Rorona is looking at the bulletin board. Go ask her what’s she doing.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Attitude 2
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノシセイ２
m_vList.DESC: To help Rorona who has accepted many commissions, give the “Rose Petal“ to her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give “Rose Petal“ x3 to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Pride
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノキョウジ
m_vList.DESC: Rorona is looking at the bulletin board again. Go ask her.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Pride 2
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノキョウジ２
m_vList.DESC: To synthesize the pie for Rorona as a token of gratitude, collect the ingredient “Cod“ and give it to Peppermint.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good “Cod“ (quality 60) x3 to Peppermint in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Rorona’s Behavior
m_vList.KANA: ロロナノフルマイ
m_vList.DESC: Rorona is beckoning us. Go ask her what she wants.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Rorona (Adult) in the Academy.

m_vList.DESC: Meruru is also active in the Academy. Let’s see how is she doing.

m_vList.NAME: Sorel Auseil
m_vList.KANA: ソレルオーゼイユ
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Auseil, a girl in man’s clothes who has come here through the space-time distortion and looks like Sorel.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Overwhelming Magic Power
m_vList.KANA: アットウテキマホウリョク１
m_vList.DESC: Auseil is beckoning us. Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Overwhelming Magic Power 2
m_vList.KANA: アットウテキマホウリョク２
m_vList.DESC: To help Auseil with the monster hunt commission, go check the monster at the entrance of the “Goblins’ Den“.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Olbius] Go to the entrance of the “Goblins’ Den“.

m_vList.NAME: The Overwhelming Magic Power 3
m_vList.KANA: アットウテキマホウリョク３
m_vList.DESC: To help Auseil with the monster hunt commission, defeat the “Fierce Ooze“ at the entrance of the “Goblins’ Den“.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Olbius] Defeat the “Fierce Ooze“ at the entrance of the “Goblins’ Den“.

m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Auseil’s Accelerant 2
m_vList.KANA: オーゼイユノショクバイ２
m_vList.DESC: Give “Fresh Leaf“ x5, which can be the accelerant for the magic, to Auseil.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give “Fresh Leaf“ x5 to Auseil.

m_vList.NAME: Courting Publicity and the Opera
m_vList.KANA: メダチタガリトゲキ
m_vList.DESC: For some reason, Auseil is practicing her vocalizations. Let’s ask her what she’s doing.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Magic Power and the Price
m_vList.KANA: マホウノチカラトソノダイショウ１
m_vList.DESC: Sorel and Auseil seem to be talking. Go check it out.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Magic Power and the Price 2
m_vList.KANA: マホウノチカラトソノダイショウ２
m_vList.DESC: Sorel wants to observe how Auseil uses her magic in a close range. Go to the entrance of “Rosa Maze“ to see if there is any suitable monster.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the entrance of the “Rosa Maze“.

m_vList.NAME: The Magic Power and the Price 3
m_vList.KANA: マホウノチカラトソノダイショウ３
m_vList.DESC: To observe Auseil’s magic, fight with the “Rosa Wolf“ at the entrance of the “Rosa Maze“.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat the “Rosa Wolf“ at the entrance of the “Rosa Maze“.

m_vList.NAME: The Source of the Magic Power
m_vList.KANA: マリョクノミナモト１
m_vList.DESC: Auseil is beckoning us again. Go ask her what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Source of the Magic Power 2
m_vList.KANA: マリョクノミナモト２
m_vList.DESC: The source of Auseil’s magic power is delicious food. Let’s give her top class “Fish&Chips“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good “Fish&Chips“ (quality 60) x3 to Auseil in the Academy./The ingredients are “Cod“, “Potato“ and “Wheat“.

m_vList.NAME: Auseil’s Guidance
m_vList.KANA: オーゼイユノミチビキ
m_vList.DESC: Sorel and Auseil are talking again. Go check it out.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Auseil in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Anis Phonic
m_vList.KANA: アニス・フォニク
m_vList.DESC: Talk to Phonic, a girl in man’s clothes who has come here through the space-time distortion and looks like Anis.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Fieldwork on the Alien World
m_vList.KANA: イセカイフィールドワーク
m_vList.DESC: Phonic seems impatient. Ask her what’s wrong.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Fieldwork on the Alien World 2
m_vList.KANA: イセカイフィールドワーク２
m_vList.DESC: To investigate the difference between the world that Phonic lived in and this world, go to the “Ruhuna Village“.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Olbius] Go to the entrance of the “Ruhuna Village“.

m_vList.NAME: The Fieldwork on the Alien World 3
m_vList.KANA: イセカイフィールドワーク３

m_vList.CONDITION: [Olbius] Defeat the “Big Ruhuna Frog“ at the entrance of the “Ruhuna Village“.

m_vList.NAME: Phonic’s Sword
m_vList.KANA: フォニクノケン

m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Her Voice, Loud and Clear
m_vList.KANA: ソノコエ、タカラカニ
m_vList.DESC: Phonic seems to be practicing vocalizations. Ask her what she is doing.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Sage Phonic
m_vList.KANA: ケンジャフォニク
m_vList.DESC: It seems Ru wants to ask you a favor. Ask him about it.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Ru in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Sage Phonic 2
m_vList.KANA: ケンジャフォニク２
m_vList.DESC: Ru wants the “Book of Magic“ for research. It’s requested by Phonic. Give him the good “Book of Magic“.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good “Book of Magic“ x1 (quality 60) to Ru./The ingredients are “Japanese Ash Branch“, “Puni Bead?“, “Heath Grass“ and “Water Lily“.

m_vList.NAME: Phonic and the Study Group
m_vList.KANA: フォニクトベンキョウカイ
m_vList.DESC: It seems Anis wants to talk to Phonic. To create a chance for her, go talk to Phonic.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Phonic and the Study Group 2
m_vList.KANA: フォニクトベンキョウカイ２
m_vList.DESC: Give the good “Wizard’s Secret Potion“ to Anis and Phonic as the material of their study group.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good “Wizard’s Secret Potion“ x1 (quality 60) to Phonic./The ingredients are “Taun“, “Yellow Neutralizer“ and “Plum“.

m_vList.NAME: The Thing That Won’t Betray
m_vList.KANA: ウラギラナイモノ
m_vList.DESC: Anis seems to have come up with the answer to the homework from Phonic. Let’s go to Phonic together.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Phonic in the Academy.

m_vList.KANA: サイキョウヲメザスケンシ
m_vList.DESC: Aurel, the swordsman with a spiky hairstyle who has come here through the space-time distortion, seems to have a certain goal. Go talk to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: A Child’s Sense of Taste?
m_vList.KANA: ミカクハオコチャマ？
m_vList.DESC: It seems Peppermint is making a fuss about being hungry. Go ask her before she rampages.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Peppermint in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Unique Swordplay
m_vList.KANA: ドクトクノケンギ
m_vList.DESC: Aurel is practicing his swordplay. Talk to him so we can watch him practicing.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Bloodline and the Responsibility
m_vList.KANA: ケツゾクトセキム
m_vList.DESC: Aurel is standing in front of the bulletin board. Go ask him what’s he looking at.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Bloodline and the Responsibility 2
m_vList.KANA: ケツゾクトセキム２
m_vList.DESC: Head south from the “Entrance of the Academy“ with Aurel toward the river to eliminate the monsters of the commission.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Olbius] Go to the vicinity of the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: The Bloodline and the Responsibility 3
m_vList.KANA: ケツゾクトセキム３
m_vList.DESC: Eliminate the monster appearing in the vicinity of the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“, with Aurel.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Olbius] Defeat the “Petit Imp“ appearing the vicinity of the river, south of the “Entrance of the Academy“.

m_vList.NAME: Aurel’s Training
m_vList.KANA: オーレルノシュウレン
m_vList.DESC: Aurel is looking for you. Go ask him what happened.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: Aurel’s Training 2
m_vList.KANA: オーレルノシュウレン２
m_vList.DESC: Go to the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“ to see the training of Aurel.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Go to the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“.

m_vList.NAME: Aurel’s Training 3
m_vList.KANA: オーレルノシュウレン３
m_vList.DESC: Aurel’s training is defeating monsters incessantly!? As expected, he is outnumbered. Go defeat the monster at the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“ with Aurel.
m_vList.CONDITION: [Ribrum] Defeat “Metal Puni“ at the entrance of “Rose Hip Mansion“.

m_vList.NAME: The Cherished Sword
m_vList.KANA: トッテオキノケン
m_vList.DESC: It seems Aurel wants to ask you a favor. Ask him about it.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.

m_vList.NAME: The Cherished Sword 2
m_vList.KANA: トッテオキノケン２
m_vList.DESC: To get the sword that Aurel cherishes, give him good “Warrior’s Secret Potion“ x3.
m_vList.CONDITION: Give good “Warrior’s Secret Potion“ (quality 60) x3 to Aurel in the Academy./The ingredients are “Taun“, “Yellow Neutralizer“ and “Mushroom“.

m_vList.NAME: Aiming to Be the Strongest
m_vList.KANA: サイキョウヲミスエテ
m_vList.DESC: Aurel called you. He looks meeker than usual, let’s talk to him.
m_vList.CONDITION: Talk to Aurel in the Academy.
